docreader

Class DocumentSummaryReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • docreader.DocumentSummaryReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericReader<java.lang.Void>

    class DocumentSummaryReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericReader<java.lang.Void>
    Read out metadata of the Word document (title, author, Word version, ...)
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka
